root.name: Cardinal Syn
root.description: CharactersCharacters which appear at the start of the game: * Nephra * Plague * McKrieg * Hecklar * Vanguard * Princess Orion * Finkster * Mongoro Unlockable characters by completeing the story mode with the original characters: * Kron * Bimorphia * Moloch * Kahn * Juni * Vodu * Stygian * Mongwan * Syn * Redemptor
